Speak With Small Beasts: Simple communication with small animals
Tongue Of The Sun And Moon: Communicate in any language

Combat
Hit Points: 115 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 13 Attacks Per Round: 2
Weapon Proficiency: Battleaxe; Morningstar; Pike; Shortsword; Simple
Armor: None Shield: Weapons: Light Hammer (+4 1d4-2 R20/60); Mace (+8 1d6+2); Sling (+8 1d4+2 R30/120); Unarmed (+8 1d10+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Martial Arts: When unarmored, gain +4 attack and damage with monk weapons, raise damage die to 1d10, and gain Monk Bonus Attack
Monk Unarmored Defense: +1 AC in no armor
Strength Attack Adjustment: -2
Strength Damage Adjustment: -2
Weapon Master: Weapon Proficiency (Choose 4 from any)
Debilitating Barrage: Spend 3 Ki Points after unarmed hit for foe vulnerability to chosen damage type for 1 min or until damaged
Deflect Missiles: Use Reaction to reduce missile damage by 1d10+22
Dual Wielder: +1 AC w/two weapons; use two-weapon fighting w/any one-handed weapons; draw or stow two weapons at once
Extort Truth: Spend 1 Ki Point after unarmed hit to prevent foe lying and give all Adv on Charisma for 10 min (Cha neg)
Extract Aspects: Use Reaction after Flurry Of Blows hit to gain info about foe and unarmed attack Reaction to foe miss until next rest
Flurry Of Blows: Spend 1 Ki Point for 2 additional unarmed strikes
Ki-Empowered Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magical
Mind Of Mercury: Spend 1 Ki Point for extra Reaction
Monk Bonus Attack: Bonus unarmed strike after monk weapon attack
Patient Defense: Spend 1 Ki Point for bonus Dodge
Perfect Self: Minimum 4 Ki Points after initiative
Small: Disadv on attacks w/heavy weapons
Step Of The Wind: Spend 1 Ki Point for bonus Disengage or Dash and dbl jump
Stunning Strike: Spend 1 Ki Point to stun foe after hit (DC 15 Con neg) for 1 rd
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Constitution; Dexterity; Intelligence; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 7; Constitution: 8; Dexterity: 8; Intelligence: 9; Strength: 4; Wisdom: 7
Save Notes:
Diamond Soul: Proficient all saves, spend 1 Ki Point to re-roll
Evasion: Dex save yields no damage instead of half
Gnome Cunning: Adv on Cha, Int, and Wis saves vs. magic
Purity Of Body: Immune to disease and poison
Stillness Of Mind: End self charm and fright at will
Magic
Attack: M: 7; W: 9 Spell DC: M: 15; W: 17
Spells:
Astral Projection (M9 [Empty Body] Necr): R10' Self and 8 willing targets project to astral plane
Minor Illusion (W0 [Natural Illusionist] Illu): R30' Creates sound of 1 creature or 5' cu image (Investigation disbelieve) for 1 min
Magic Notes:
Elemental Adept (Acid): Acid spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Elemental Adept (Lightning): Lightning spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Empty Body: Spend 4 Ki Points for 1 min invisibility w/resistance to all damage but force, 8 Ki Points for Astral Projection
Natural Illusionist: Know Minor Illusion cantrip
